caption.title: Plots of log human incidence of WNV (per 100,000 people) on (A) species richness contrasts constructed from the difference between neighboring pairs of counties; and (B) Shannon-Weiner evenness contrasts.
caption.p: Filled circles represent data from 1998 and open circles represent reports from 2002. The solid line is best-fit linear regression line for 1998 and the dotted line represents the regression line for 2002.
